Package me.bristermitten.mittenlib.config.reader

Class ConfigReader

java.lang.Object
me.bristermitten.mittenlib.config.reader.ConfigReader
public class ConfigReader extends Object
Responsible for both reading and mapping data, delegating to ObjectLoaders and ObjectMappers
